\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{rects}{rects}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \mbox{\hyperlink{classKHyperrect}{Rect}} access\+\_\+t\+::rects\mbox{[}3\mbox{]}}

BLAS matrices have 2 rects in their frame of reference (ld, s) \mbox{\hyperlink{classInterval}{Interval}} accesses have 3 rects different on each frame of reference (ld, s)
